text: Ndithudi kumvera ndi kupembedza, ndi kwa Mulungu yekha ndipo iwo amene amasankha ena kuti akhale owasamala m’malo mwa Mulungu amati, “Ife sitiwapembedza iwo ayi koma timafuna kuti iwo atifikitse pafupi ndi Mulungu.” Ndithudi Mulungu adzaweruza pa zonse zimene iwo amatsutsana. Ndithudi Mulungu satsogolera wabodza ndi wosakhulupirira
